column4: When I'm going to download with bittorent i get the following error: "ERROR: Could not load wxPython. In order to use this script, you must have wxPython installed. It is avaiable in the package libwxgtk2.3-python." but i can't find the package, anyone who have a bunch of good sources?
it's popey, not popeye, it's a curses (text) based bit torrent client
you should already have btdownloadcurses, it comes with bittorrent
but I am so f**king bad in text-based prgms..
you don't need to be any "good" at anything.. you just run it with one parameter, the torrent file, job done
also, saving the torrentfile on disk, after that take it from console?
1. fetching the *.torrent 2: open with nautilus choosing to open with what?
download torrent, open terminal, cd to directory containing torrent, type bitdownloadcurses <torrentfilename>
